review.title: Thorough but fair technical interview process
review.content: Had 1 initial screen, 2 technical rounds focusing on algorithms and system design, and 1 behavioral round. Interviewers were professional and helpful.

review.title: Intense technical and practical assessment
review.content: Process included practical manufacturing problems, technical knowledge test, and on-site facility tour. Focus on real-world problem solving.

review.title: Comprehensive technical and problem-solving focus
review.content: Multiple rounds including coding, system design, and case studies. Strong emphasis on problem decomposition and communication skills.

review.title: Culture-focused with strong technical assessment
review.content: Four rounds total: initial screen, technical coding, system design, and culture fit. Heavy emphasis on cultural values and working style.

review.title: Design-focused interview with practical exercises
review.content: Portfolio review, design challenge, and team collaboration exercise. Good balance of practical skills and theoretical knowledge.
